articles.title: Prix élevés en Nouvelle-Calédonie: conflit entre producteurs et importateurs
articles.english_title: High Prices in New Caledonia: Conflict Between Local Producers and Importers
articles.simplified_french_title: Prix élevés en Nouvelle-Calédonie: conflit entre producteurs et importateurs
articles.simplified_english_title: High Prices in New Caledonia: Conflict Between Local Producers and Importers
articles.summary: En Nouvelle-Calédonie, les prix sont 30% plus élevés qu'en France. Le gouvernement propose des changements, créant des tensions entre commerçants.
articles.english_summary: In New Caledonia, prices are 30% higher than in mainland France. Government reforms are creating tensions between local business groups.
articles.french_summary: En Nouvelle-Calédonie, les prix sont 30% plus élevés qu'en France. Le gouvernement propose des changements, créant des tensions entre commerçants.
articles.original_article_title: Vie chère en Nouvelle-Calédonie : tensions entre producteurs locaux et importateurs autour de la lutte contre l’inflation

Vie.explanation: In this context, refers to daily living and basic needs
Vie.cultural_note: Often used in expressions about cost of living ('vie quotidienne', 'vie chère')

chère.explanation: Adjective meaning expensive or dear, commonly used to discuss cost of living
chère.cultural_note: 'Vie chère' is a common expression in French territories to describe high living costs

en.explanation: Used to indicate location or place

Nouvelle-Calédonie.display_format: **New Caledonia:** French territory in the South Pacific
Nouvelle-Calédonie.explanation: A special collectivity of France located in the South Pacific Ocean
Nouvelle-Calédonie.cultural_note: Has a unique status within the French Republic with ongoing debates about independence

tensions.explanation: Refers to strained relationships or conflicts between groups

entre.explanation: Used to indicate relationship or position between two or more things

producteurs.display_format: **Producers:** Those who make or grow products
producteurs.explanation: Refers to local businesses and farmers who produce goods in New Caledonia
producteurs.cultural_note: Local producers often play a crucial role in French overseas territories' economies

locaux.explanation: Refers to people or businesses from New Caledonia

et.explanation: Used to join words or phrases

importateurs.display_format: **Importers:** Those who bring in foreign goods
importateurs.explanation: Businesses that bring products from other countries into New Caledonia
importateurs.cultural_note: Import-export relationships are crucial for French overseas territories

autour de.explanation: Used to indicate the subject or focus of a discussion or conflict

la.explanation: Definite article used before feminine nouns

lutte.explanation: Refers to efforts to combat or resolve a problem

contre.explanation: Used to indicate opposition or resistance to something

l'inflation.explanation: The general increase in prices and fall in the purchasing value of money
l'inflation.cultural_note: A major economic concern in French overseas territories where costs are typically higher than mainland France

articles.title: Le Pen et Bardella organisent un grand rassemblement avec Viktor Orban dans le Loiret
articles.english_title: Le Pen and Bardella Organize Large Rally with Viktor Orban in Loiret
articles.simplified_french_title: Le Pen et Bardella organisent un grand rassemblement avec Viktor Orban dans le Loiret
articles.simplified_english_title: Le Pen and Bardella Organize Large Rally with Viktor Orban in Loiret
articles.summary: Le Rassemblement national organise une fête pour célébrer sa victoire aux élections européennes. 5000 personnes sont attendues à Mormant-sur-Vernisson.
articles.english_summary: The National Rally is organizing a celebration for their European election victory. 5,000 people are expected to attend in Mormant-sur-Vernisson.
articles.french_summary: Le Rassemblement national organise une fête pour célébrer sa victoire aux élections européennes. 5000 personnes sont attendues à Mormant-sur-Vernisson.
articles.original_article_title: Viktor Orban invité, une contre-manifestation organisée... Ce que l'on sait du rassemblement de l'extrême droite européenne autour de Marine Le Pen et Jordan Bardella dans le Loiret

Viktor Orban.explanation: Current Prime Minister of Hungary, known for his conservative nationalist policies
Viktor Orban.cultural_note: A controversial figure in European politics, known for his anti-EU stance and right-wing populist approach

invité.explanation: Used as an adjective here to indicate someone who has been asked to attend an event

une.explanation: Used before feminine nouns to indicate an undefined item or concept

contre-manifestation.explanation: A protest organized in opposition to another event or demonstration
contre-manifestation.cultural_note: Counter-protests are common in French political culture, especially regarding far-right gatherings

Ce que.explanation: Used to introduce information about something

l'on.explanation: More formal version of 'on', used after 'l'' for better sound

sait.explanation: Present tense of the verb 'to know'

du.explanation: Used to show possession or connection

rassemblement.explanation: A planned gathering of people for a specific purpose, often political
rassemblement.cultural_note: Political rallies are important events in French political culture

de.explanation: Used to show relationship or possession

l'extrême droite.display_format: **Far-right:** The extreme right wing of politics
l'extrême droite.explanation: Political ideology characterized by nationalist and conservative views
l'extrême droite.cultural_note: A significant and controversial force in contemporary European politics

européenne.explanation: Relating to Europe or the European Union
européenne.cultural_note: Refers to the broader European political context

autour de.explanation: Literally means 'around' but here means 'centered on' or 'led by'

Marine Le Pen.display_format: **Marine Le Pen:** French far-right political leader
Marine Le Pen.explanation: Leader of the National Rally party in France
Marine Le Pen.cultural_note: Daughter of Jean-Marie Le Pen, she has worked to modernize her party's image

et.explanation: Used to connect words or phrases

Jordan Bardella.explanation: President of the National Rally party and Member of the European Parliament
Jordan Bardella.cultural_note: Youngest president of a major French political party

le Loiret.explanation: An administrative department in north-central France
le Loiret.cultural_note: Located in the Centre-Val de Loire region, known for its agricultural areas

articles.title: Macron demande d'agir pour protéger les océans à Nice
articles.english_title: Macron Calls for Action to Protect Oceans at Nice Summit
articles.simplified_french_title: Macron demande d'agir pour protéger les océans à Nice
articles.simplified_english_title: Macron Calls for Action to Protect Oceans at Nice Summit
articles.summary: Lors d'une réunion à Nice, Macron affirme que les océans et les zones polaires ne sont pas à vendre, s'opposant aux idées de Trump.
articles.english_summary: At a meeting in Nice, Macron asserts that oceans and polar regions are not for sale, opposing Trump's expansionist ideas.
articles.french_summary: Lors d'une réunion à Nice, Macron affirme que les océans et les zones polaires ne sont pas à vendre, s'opposant aux idées de Trump.
articles.original_article_title: Sommet sur l'océan à Nice : Emmanuel Macron appelle à la "mobilisation" pour des "océans" en "ébullition"

Sommet.explanation: A conference or meeting of high-level leaders or officials
Sommet.cultural_note: International summits are significant diplomatic events in French politics

sur.explanation: Indicates the subject or topic of discussion

l'.explanation: Used before words beginning with a vowel or silent h

océan.explanation: Refers to the Earth's major bodies of saltwater
océan.cultural_note: France has significant maritime interests with territories in multiple oceans

Nice.explanation: A major city on the French Riviera
Nice.cultural_note: An important Mediterranean port city and tourist destination in France

Emmanuel Macron.explanation: The current President of France, elected in 2017 and re-elected in 2022
Emmanuel Macron.cultural_note: Known for his pro-European stance and environmental initiatives

appelle.explanation: To make an appeal or request for action

mobilisation.explanation: The act of organizing and encouraging people to take action for a cause
mobilisation.cultural_note: Often used in French political discourse for collective action

ébullition.explanation: Literally means 'boiling', but used metaphorically to indicate urgent crisis or turmoil
ébullition.cultural_note: Often used in French media to describe critical environmental situations
